body_html:
but determining that fully is equivalent to finding a solution to a linear diophantine equation in n variables, where n is proportional to the number of dimensions in the input tensors.

Even if this is true, the examples calebh posted are very simple and would be caught by the current test we have in PyTorch. We should apply this test.
body_text:
but determining that fully is equivalent to finding a solution to a linear diophantine equation in n variables, where n is proportional to the number of dimensions in the input tensors.

Even if this is true, the examples calebh posted are very simple and would be caught by the current test we have in PyTorch. We should apply this test.
body:
> but determining that fully is equivalent to finding a solution to a linear diophantine equation in n variables, where n is proportional to the number of dimensions in the input tensors.

Even if this is true, the examples calebh posted are very simple and would be caught by the current test we have in PyTorch. We should apply this test.
